title: TRIUMPH font?
content:
Hi guys,

please help me identify this logo. What is the typeface?

Thanks a million!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [triumph-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091004032109/http:/typophile.com/files/triumph-logo_0.jpg) | 22.81 KB |
author: evelinat

comments.content: Designed by MetaDesign. Most certainly custom type.
For something similar, have a look at [Mic 32](http://web.archive.org/web/20091004032109/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/moretype/mic_32_new_family_pro/).
